III. Member of a scientific advisory entity
Norwegian Scientific Committee for Food Safety

Chair of Committee. Reelected 4/2014 I have no current assignment on endocrine issues. I have no current assignment regarding mycotoxins. In 2013 the Committee adopted an opinion on mycotoxins. The "masked" mycotoxin DON-glycoside was mentioned in the opinion, but no further assessment of this substance was made due to lack of data.
III. Member of a scientific advisory entity
Vitenskapskomiteen for mattrygghet (VKM), Norway, Oslo. Norwegian Scientific Committee on Food Safety, Panel on food additives, food contact mertial, flavourings and cosmetics.

Risk assessment of Food additives, food flavourings, food contact materials,Cosmetics and related matters. The Panel (when I was a chair) adopted in June 2008 an opinion on specific studies on developmental effects of bisphenol A. I was not part of the working group that drafted the opinion.

Deputy Director-General. The institute is not doing risk management in the remit of EFSA. I have currently no specific assignment to tasks related to endocrine issues.
Norges miljø og biovitenskapelige universitet (NMBU), Norway, Oslo and Ås, Norwegian university of Life Ssciences /Norwegian School of Veterinary Science
Professor II in Food toxicology Teaching and research
Norvegian Research Council; Norvegian Cancer Society; European Commission DG research

Research funding has only been to scientific research resulting in publications in scientific journals or reports open to the public. There have been no industry or any other private funding of research. The topics of resesearch: 1.Toxicology of food contaminants, e.g. acrylamide, HMF, dioxin/ PCB and other contaminants in food 2. Cancer research mainly focused on experimental studies on intestinal carcinogenesis related to food 3. Epidemiological research into aspects of food safety and nutrition, mainly related dietary exposure studies on nutrients, food contaminants and also pregnacy and child outcomes. EU funded projects FP6 and FP7: HEATOX, NEWGENERIS, HELIX,
